title: SMC_UnitVectorToRPY (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK SMC_UnitVectorToRPY
This function block will calculate the RPY-angle
(referring to the old coordinate system)
from the unit vectors of the new coordinate system.
For detailed information of transformation modules see
the overview on kinematic transformations in the CNC
online help.

rows.Name: vX
rows.Comment:
x-coordinate of unit vector of new coordinate system
(in respect of old coordinate system)

rows:
y-coordinate of unit vector of new coordinate system
(in respect of old coordinate system)

z-coordinate of unit vector of new coordinate system
(in respect of old coordinate system)
Signals, that an error has occurred within the function block
Error description:1: No error (bError=FALSE)2: Vectors do not have length 13: Vectors are not orthogonal4: No right hand system
